an4.115:5.1: Tatra, bhikkhave, yamidaṃ ṭhānaṃ amanāpaṃ kātuṃ;
an4.115:5.3: idaṃ, bhikkhave, ṭhānaṃ ubhayeneva na kattabbaṃ maññati.
an4.115:5.4: Yampidaṃ ṭhānaṃ amanāpaṃ kātuṃ;
an4.115:5.5: imināpi naṃ na kattabbaṃ maññati.
an4.115:5.7: imināpi naṃ na kattabbaṃ maññati.
an4.115:5.8: Idaṃ, bhikkhave, ṭhānaṃ ubhayeneva na kattabbaṃ maññati.
an4.115:6.1: Tatra, bhikkhave, yamidaṃ ṭhānaṃ amanāpaṃ kātuṃ;
an4.115:6.3: imasmiṃ, bhikkhave, ṭhāne bālo ca paṇḍito ca veditabbo purisathāme purisavīriye purisaparakkame.
an4.115:6.6: atha carahidaṃ ṭhānaṃ kayiramānaṃ atthāya saṃvattatī’ti.
an4.115:6.8: Tassa taṃ ṭhānaṃ akayiramānaṃ anatthāya saṃvattati.
an4.115:6.9: Paṇḍito ca kho, bhikkhave, iti paṭisañcikkhati:
an4.115:6.11: atha carahidaṃ ṭhānaṃ kayiramānaṃ atthāya saṃvattatī’ti.
an4.115:6.13: Tassa taṃ ṭhānaṃ kayiramānaṃ atthāya saṃvattati.
an4.115:7.1: Tatra, bhikkhave, yamidaṃ ṭhānaṃ manāpaṃ kātuṃ;
an4.115:7.3: imasmimpi, bhikkhave, ṭhāne bālo ca paṇḍito ca veditabbo purisathāme purisavīriye purisaparakkame.
an4.115:7.6: atha carahidaṃ ṭhānaṃ kayiramānaṃ anatthāya saṃvattatī’ti.
an4.115:7.8: Tassa taṃ ṭhānaṃ kayiramānaṃ anatthāya saṃvattati.
an4.115:7.9: Paṇḍito ca kho, bhikkhave, iti paṭisañcikkhati:
an4.115:7.11: atha carahidaṃ ṭhānaṃ kayiramānaṃ anatthāya saṃvattatī’ti.
an4.115:7.13: Tassa taṃ ṭhānaṃ akayiramānaṃ atthāya saṃvattati.
an4.115:8.1: Tatra, bhikkhave, yamidaṃ ṭhānaṃ manāpaṃ kātuṃ, tañca kayiramānaṃ atthāya saṃvattati—
an4.115:8.2: idaṃ, bhikkhave, ṭhānaṃ ubhayeneva kattabbaṃ maññati.
an4.115:8.3: Yampidaṃ ṭhānaṃ manāpaṃ kātuṃ, imināpi naṃ kattabbaṃ maññati;
an4.115:8.4: yampidaṃ ṭhānaṃ kayiramānaṃ atthāya saṃvattati, imināpi naṃ kattabbaṃ maññati.
an4.115:8.5: Idaṃ, bhikkhave, ṭhānaṃ ubhayeneva kattabbaṃ maññati.
